item.title: Agentic AI with Pydantic-AI Part 1.
item.author: tabularasa8931@gmail.com (Han)
item.description:
Introduction

AI has already changed how we interact with technology. The real shift is happening now with agents: AI systems that can reason, make decisions, and take action.

Unlike a chatbot that passively replies, an agent can break down complex tasks, call APIs or databases, use tools, and deliver structured results. This is what makes the idea of Agentic AI so powerful â€” it’s not just about conversation, it’s about problem-solving with initiative.
